snippet: Some supporters of Hillary Rodham Clinton, a staunch supporter of Israel, say she need not worry about excessive blowback from moderate Jewish supporters even if she were to join progressive Jews in criticizing Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
abstract: Some supporters of Hillary Rodham Clinton, a staunch supporter of Israel, say she need not worry about excessive blowback from moderate Jewish supporters even if she were to join progressive Jews in criticizing Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

headline.main: Clinton Backers Say Criticizing Netanyahu  Can Wait
